item.title: Why I Only Run in Balega Hidden Comfort Socks
item.dc:creator: Greg Kaganyuk
item.description: I discovered the Balega socks about 4 years ago while browsing an online running forum. At the time, they were priced at around $10 a pair. As a new runner and budget conscience shopper, I balked at the price. I had been buying 3-5 pairs of so-called “running socks” online and at Costco for $15-$20. ... Read more

item.title: How do I hire you as a writer or SEO expert?
item.dc:creator: Greg Kaganyuk
item.description: First and foremost, thank you for expressing your interest in hiring me as a writer. I believe I’ll be able to prove my worth and showcase my value for you quickly. My writing experience includes working on business tax websites and niche/hobby websites about nutrition, drones, and lock picking. My professional background includes cartography, drones, ...
